name: Submit response
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for submit the user response for each question in quiz model.

Request payload must contain the following fields:

quiz_question_id : NUMBER
selected_option: STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/quiz/1/response

raw 
  {
    "quiz_question_id":1,
    "selected_option":"o1"   
}

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"status":200,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"quiz_response_id":6,"user_id":40,"quiz_id":"1","response":"{\"1\":{\"quiz_question_id\":1,\"selected_option\":\"o1\",\"question\":\"Finding problems around you and trying to solve them makes you a _________________________.\",\"correct_answer\":\"Problem Solver\",\"level\":\"HARD\",\"question_no\":1,\"is_correct\":false}}","status":"ACTIVE","created_by":40,"created_at":"2022-09-11T13:32:54.000Z","updated_by":40,"updated_at":"2022-09-23T09:56:08.973Z","is_correct":false,"msg":"“Oh, you might have got confused. The correct answer is : C.\n\t\tWhy don’t you watch ‘Video 2: Solver in Us’  and try a similar question again","ar_image":"/images/quiz_imgs/quiz_1_ar_image_ans_correct.png","ar_video":{"course_topic_id":1,"course_module_id":1,"topic_type_id":1,"topic_type":"VIDEO","title":"Our Future","status":"","created_by":40,"created_at":null,"updated_by":40,"updated_at":"2022-09-23T09:55:56.000Z","video":null},"accimg":"/images/quiz_imgs/quiz_accimg_teacher.png","redirect_to":{"course_topic_id":1,"course_module_id":1,"topic_type_id":1,"topic_type":"VIDEO","title":"Our Future","status":"","created_by":40,"created_at":null,"updated_by":40,"updated_at":"2022-09-23T09:55:56.000Z","video":null}}]}
